sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Nav from '../Nav/Nav'; import Footer from '../Footer/Footer'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, BarChart, Bar, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts'; import axios from 'axios'; function Home() { const [inventoryStats, setInventoryStats] = useState(null); const [inventoryData, setInventoryData] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); // Sample production data (in real app, this would come from backend) const productionData = [ { month: 'Jan', Production: 450, Recycling: 280, Filters: 320 }, { month: 'Feb', Production: 380, Recycling: 220, Filters: 290 }, { month: 'Mar', Production: 520, Recycling: 310, Filters: 410 }, { month: 'Apr', Production: 680, Recycling: 420, Filters: 550 }, { month: 'May', Production: 590, Recycling: 360, Filters: 480 }, { month: 'Jun', Production: 720, Recycling: 480, Filters: 620 }, { month: 'Jul', Production: 650, Recycling: 520, Filters: 580 }, { month: 'Aug', Production: 780, Recycling: 580, Filters: 670 }, { month: 'Sep', Production: 540, Recycling: 720, Filters: 460 }, { month: 'Oct', Production: 820, Recycling: 580, Filters: 720 }, { month: 'Nov', Production: 890, Recycling: 750, Filters: 780 }, { month: 'Dec', Production: 750, Recycling: 680, Filters: 650 }, ]; useEffect(() => { fetchInventoryData(); }, []); const fetchInventoryData = async () => { try { const [statsResponse, inventoryResponse] = await Promise.all([ axios.get('http://localhost:5000/Inventory/stats/overview'), axios.get('http://localhost:5000/Inventory') ]); setInventoryStats(statsResponse.data.stats); setInventoryData(inventoryResponse.data.inventory); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching inventory data:', error); // Set default data if API fails setInventoryStats({ totalItems: 5, lowStockItems: 2, outOfStockItems: 1, inStockItems: 2, totalQuantity: 150 }); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'In Stock': return 'text-success-600 bg-success-100'; case 'Low Stock': return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-100'; case 'Out of Stock': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-100'; default: return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-100'; } }; const COLORS = ['#0077B6', '#00B4D8', '#009688', '#FF6B6B', '#4ECDC4']; return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome, Factory Manager

Monitor factory operations, manage resources, and ensure smooth water supply & recycling processes. Track inventory levels and production metrics in real-time.

{/* Quick Stats */}

Raw Material Inventory

{loading ? '...' : inventoryStats?.totalItems || 0} Items

Low Stock Items

{loading ? '...' : inventoryStats?.lowStockItems || 0} Items

Out of Stock

{loading ? '...' : inventoryStats?.outOfStockItems || 0} Items

Total Quantity

{loading ? '...' : inventoryStats?.totalQuantity || 0} Units

{/* Charts Section */}
{/* Production Chart */}

Monthly Production vs Recycling

{/* Inventory Distribution */}

Inventory Distribution

`${name}: ${quantity}`} outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="quantity" > {inventoryData.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
{/* Inventory Status Table */}

Current Inventory Status

Download PDF Report
{inventoryData.map((item) => ( ))}
Item Name Quantity Status Last Updated
{item.name} {item.quantity} {item.unit} {item.status} {new Date(item.lastUpdated).toLocaleDateString()}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activities

New inventory items added to the system
Low stock alert for RO Membranes
Production target achieved for this month
UV Cartridge stock depleted - urgent restock needed
{/* Quick Actions */}
); } export default Home;
